Reviews.Content: location reception pretty slow main road gran via accessible metro airport 1 transfer 250 trains excellent clean air conditioned ride easy looking city centre plus free wifi excellent reception breakfast buffet actually expected variety european standards offered cold hot dishes pretty nice hotel located 1015 mins royal palace walking 5 mins sol youre looking central crash pretty decent spot decent im glad brought own sandals carpeting pretty suspect overall bad
